newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-MATERAZZI NAMED TO COACH ITALY'S BRESCIA.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-MATERAZZI NAMED TO COACH ITALY'S BRESCIA.

text.p: Newly-promoted Italian serie A side Brescia have named Giuseppe Materazzi to replace former head coach Eddy Reja.
Materazzi is to take over immediately at the northern club after Reja, who led the side back into the top flight, stepped down on Friday citing a long-standing dispute with management.
Materazzi, 51, coached Padova in the second division last year after several seasons at the helm of southern club Bari.
